original_title: ぼくたちは見た－ガザ・サムニ家のこどもたち
overview: A documentary of Palestinian children that lived through the Israeli military's intervention in the Gaza Strip in late 2008. The film depicts how the children of the Samuni family, that lost 29 members in the conflict, have accepted the deaths of their loved ones and how they try to overcome.
title: What We Saw - Gaza, The children of Samuni family
